titles.title: DNA Felony Collection Act of 2008
A bill to require that all individuals convicted of a felony under State law provide a DNA sample.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/10/2008--Introduced. DNA Felony Collection Act of 2008 - Directs the Attorney General to require states to: (1) collect a DNA sample from each individual convicted of a felony under the laws of such states; and (2) include DNA analysis results from such samples in a federal or state index of DNA analysis records.
